How to make a New blog in blogger

Blog is a kind of web site that can easily be updated. They also more friendly with Search engines like Google, Yahoo and Bing. If can function as a website as well. Check this blog to have a basic idea about a blog Blog Tips and Tricks. Using a blog you can earn money as well. Check this out to see The importance of blogging

Selection of a topic plays a vital role in blogging. You should select an appropriate topic to make a new blog. Read this to know How to select a blog for blogging

Blogger is one of the most popular blogging site throughout the whole world. You can make your own blog for free in blogger. Check this to learn How to create a New blog in blogger for Free

Once you made a blog you need to post articles to it. Made your own articles. Don't copy them from difference sources. Make frequent posts to your blog.

Then you need to make traffic to your blog. Traffic building means bringing visitors to your blog. Here are few tricks to build more traffic to your blog

Once you made a adequate pageviews per day, you can now focused on money making programs such as Google adsense, infolinks, click bank or other affiliate programs. Here is the technique for easy approval for Google AdSense

Once you approved for Google adsense you need to put those ads in appropriate places in your blog. Otherwise you will not be able to make a good profit. This post will show you where to Google AdSense in your Blog.

Our blog consist of more blogger tips and tricks from very basics to advanced. Visit us at http://www.techblaster.net/ and learn how to customize your blogger blog for FREE.

I am the owner and the Administrator of http://www.techblaster.net/
M.Sajith

On page optimization (SEO)

http://www.techblaster.net/2011/12/on-page-optimization-seo.html

Recent researches revealed that the online marketing is getting more popular than ever before with the advancement of internet facilities all throughout the world. Therefore most of the business owners, managers and product sellers are focused on internet based business strategies. One of the most common strategies they used is selling products through business websites and applications. Even though most people used to make a website or a blog consists of their own products they were unable to sell their products due to poor traffic (less number of customers) to their websites. The primary reason for this is the poor knowledge in website promotion and product promotion.

On page optimization (Key in SEO)

http://www.techblaster.net/2011/12/on-page-optimization-seo.html

Recent researches revealed that the online marketing is getting more popular than ever before with the advancement of internet facilities all throughout the world. Therefore most of the business owners, managers and product sellers are focused on internet based business strategies. One of the most common strategies they used is selling products through business websites and applications. Even though most people used to make a website or a blog consists of their own products they were unable to sell their products due to poor traffic (less number of customers) to their websites. The primary reason for this is the poor knowledge in website promotion and product promotion.

10 Reasons To Drop Google Page Rank

http://www.techblaster.net/2011/12/10-reasons-to-drop-google-page-rank.html

Considering the value of a website/blog to Google they assign Google Page Rank to each and every website/blog. The pages inside that particular website/blog also will have a page rank. Depending on the page rank Google will decide where to place your website or the blog in SERP (Search Engine Result Page). The Google page rank is a scale between numerical values of 0 to 10. Zero means not ranked by Google (least important for Google). The websites with page rank of 10 is considered as the most important sites for Google. No need to say that the most important websites are appearing on the first page of SERP.

Snow ball widget to blogger (X’mas)

http://www.techblaster.net/2011/12/snow-ball-widget-to-blogger-xmas.html

In this Christmas season most people are looking to decorate their blogs with different tools, gadgets and blogger widgets. This post is for the people who are willing to decorate their blogs with falling snow effect. This is a jQuery based script and work very nicely on blogger by adding falling snow everywhere in side your blogger blog.

Remove Blogger Nav bar Completely

http://www.techblaster.net/2011/12/remove-blogger-nav-bar-completely.html

Hiding of blogger nav bar (navigation bar) is not enough to bring your content just below the <body> tag which considered more search engine friendly. You need to remove blogger nav bar completely to bring your content just below the blogger nav bar. Here I explained how to do it. Check it out and leave your opinion just below the post.

Top Horizontal Hello bar above the Blogger Page

http://www.techblaster.net/2011/12/top-horizontal-hello-bar-to-blogger.html

Well one of my friend asked me how to add a top horizontal bar (Hello bar) above the blogger blog page. That means he needs to add a top horizontal bar above the header image of the blog. I know it is bit difficult to understand what I am talking about. So check the image below, then you will understand which bar I am talking about.

Show Only Post Titles on Blog Home Page

http://www.techblaster.net/2011/12/show-only-titles-on-blog-home-page.html

Some peoples like to show only the titles/topics on home page of their blogs. Then they can show more posts on the home page. In this post I am going to show you how to show only the titles on home page without displaying the post summary on the home page of your blog.

Add an icon image next to a hyperlink for blogger

http://www.techblaster.net/2012/01/add-icon-image-next-to-hyperlink.html

Branding links is a nice trick. It will easy your readers to find out what they looking for by adding an image next to your link. If it is a pdf, you can just add an icon of a pdf file adjacent to your link. By using this trick there is no need to tell this is a pdf file.

How to Get Huge Traffic from Twitter

http://www.techblaster.net/2012/01/how-to-get-huge-traffic-from-twitter.html

As we all know Twitter is one of the greatest Web 2.0 apps and it gets thousands of traffic per day. According to the reviews of SEO experts, it can bring tons of traffic to your website as well. So, if you still don't have an account on Twitter, this is the best time to open a new account and drag thousands of traffic to your blog/website.

How to get more blog traffic from Digg

http://www.techblaster.net/2012/01/how-to-get-more-blog-traffic-from-digg.html

Digg is another well-known social bookmarking site and a user friendly platform. There is millions of users visit Digg per day. Those people are looking for good content to read. If you have good and original content to post you will get thousands of hits. It seems very easy, isn’t it? No, this is not that easy to bring traffic from Digg. So it is unlike Twitter since you can drive people to your website using Twitter is easy. But if you know the method of driving traffic from Digg, it will be an easy way to bring tons of visitors to your blog/website. I have explained the methods below to drive tons of traffic from it.
